DataElement.preferredName: MFLIE Enjoyment Past 24 Hour Meal Vomiting Affect 7 Point Likert Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric response to a question of how vomiting affected a person's ability to enjoy a meal in the past 24 hours.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: MFLIE Enjoyment Past 24 Hour Meal Vomiting Affect
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The status of one's ability to perform activities of daily living and participate socially and occupationally._The level of happiness or contentment that an individual professes, or is observed to display with regards to their life situation._Past; before the present time._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24_In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day._A disorder characterized by the reflexive act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth._Any of the occasions for eating food that occur by custom or habit at more or less fixed times._To be influenced by or changed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The status of one's ability to perform activities of daily living and participate socially and occupationally.:The level of happiness or contentment that an individual professes, or is observed to display with regards to their life situation.

Concepts.definition: The status of one's ability to perform activities of daily living and participate socially and occupationally.
The level of happiness or contentment that an individual professes, or is observed to display with regards to their life situation.

Property.preferredName: Past Integer::24 Hour Meal Vomiting Affected
Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::24:In modern usage, an hour is defined as a unit of time 60 minutes, or 3600 seconds in length. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.:Any of the occasions for eating food that occur by custom or habit at more or less fixed times.:A disorder characterized by the reflexive act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth.:To be influenced by or changed.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
A unit measure of time equal to 3,600 seconds or 60 minutes. It is approximately 1/24 of a median day.
Any of the occasions for eating food that occur by custom or habit at more or less fixed times.
A disorder characterized by the reflexive act of ejecting the contents of the stomach through the mouth.
To be influenced by or changed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: Modified Functional Life Index Affect Integer::7 Point Likert Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::7_The precise location of something; a spatially limited location._A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement.

Concepts.definition: A subjective answer of no agreement or ability.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::7:The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.:A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The precise location of something; a spatially limited location.

A psychometric scale commonly used in questionnaires where a respondent is asked to evaluate an opinion according to subjective or objective criteria, by rating their level of agreement or disagreement with a statement.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support use of the Modified Functional Life Index - Emesis (MFLIE) by Duke University
